metadata.description: A series of special one-shots plotted by Alex Ross and scripted by Joe Casey debut here as Dynamite invites you to 'Meet the Bad Guys!' As the heroes return, the villains rise and this debut issue features the Green Lama and the debut of Blood Lust! What's this powerful new villain's connection to the Green Lama? Find out in this special one-shot!
metadata.name: Project Superpowers: Meet the Bad Guys
